column4: you did a sudo nautilus   didn't you?       remove the .*auth* files from yout home and try again
I'm not in nautilus. I was in gnome-terminal.
you can use [alt] +[ctrl] +[f1]   and login the console,  and there use sudo rm .*auth*    and [alt] +[F7]   will take you back to the gdm screen
I'm back. Now I hope we solve why my gdm will restart again and again
